Detailed Description

Helper classes and functions.

Function Documentation

template<class T >
static void cds::details::call_dtor ( T *  p ) [inline, static]

Helper function to call destructor of type T.

This function is empty for the type T that has trivial destructor.

template<typename T >
static bool cds::details::is_aligned ( T const *  p,
size_t  nAlign 
) [inline, static]

Checks if the pointer p nAlign is aligned.

nAlign must be power of 2.

The function is mostly intended for run-time assertion

template<int ALIGN, typename T >
static bool cds::details::is_aligned ( T const *  p ) [inline, static]

Checks if the pointer p ALIGN is aligned.

ALIGN must be power of 2.

The function is mostly intended for run-time assertion
